review.title: “As the saying goes " hind sight is 20/20".”
review.pros: Pros – Most of the staff were nice people. The doctors in the practice were extremely nice to work with and for.
review.cons: Cons – Only 15 minute break given no matter if you worked 6 hours or 10 hours. There was never any discussion about pay raises and none were given,not even annually.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give employees at least a cost of living raise to their salaries. Give 30 minute breaks or two 15 minute breaks instead of one 15 minute break.
